title: Tennis-Teenager Tsitsipas stages another upset to reach Barcelona final
text:
April 28, 2018 / 2:17 PM / Updated 38 minutes ago Teenager Tsitsipas stages another upset to reach Barcelona final Richard Martin 2 Min Read
BARCELONA (Reuters) - Greek teenager Stefanos Tsitsipas stormed into the Barcelona Open final by beating Spain’s world number 11 Pablo Carreno Busta 7-5 6-3 on Saturday to reach his first ATP showpiece. Tennis - ATP - Monte Carlo Masters - Monte-Carlo Country Club, Monte Carlo, Monaco - April 16, 2018 Stefanos Tsitsipas of Greece celebrates during his first round match against Canada’s Denis Shapovalov REUTERS/Eric Gaillard
World number one and defending champion Rafael Nadal meets Belgian David Goffin in the other semi-final later on Saturday to determine who will face Tsitsipas in Sunday’s final.
Tsitsipas, 19, had pulled off the biggest win of his career on Friday before by stunning last year’s finalist and world number seven Dominic Thiem in straight sets and was the underdog against Carreno Busta, who is ranked 52 places above him. Mar 30, 2018; Key Biscayne, FL, USA; Pablo Carreno Busta of Spain hits a backhand against Alexander Zverev of Germany (not pictured) in a men's singles semi-final of the Miami Open at Tennis Center at Crandon Park. Zverev won 6-4, 6-2. Mandatory Credit: Geoff Burke-USA TODAY Sports
The youngster got off to a flying start as he broke his opponent in the second game and marched into a 4-1 lead. The Spaniard hit back with a break to level at 5-5 but wasted a chance to break again and lost his serve to concede the set.
Tsitsipas, ranked 63rd, broke the 27-year-old for a third time to pull 4-2 ahead in the second and eventually served out the match, collapsing to the ground in elation as he won on his second match point when Carreno Busta hit beyond the baseline.
Tsitsipas becomes the first Greek player to reach an ATP final since 1973 when Nicholas Kalogeropoulos made the final of the now defunct Des Moines Open. Reporting by Richard Martin; Editing by Ken Ferris
